name: 2438 The Return (C64)
description:
Game has been Updated, See Download & install instructions.

Welcome to the Year 2438, The Year the "Invaders" Return.

A Game for the Commodore 64/TheC64Maxi and Mini or your favourite C64 Emulator, 1 Zip file with a D64,T64,TAP and a PRG File.

A Shoot 'Em' Up Construction Kit Game for your C64, 1 or 2 Players, Port 2 for Player 1 (White) and Port 1 (Green) for Player 2, You can play 1 Player in either Port.

Made and Works on Pal C64, Tested with Vice64 on NTSC it worked but Score does not show.

Have Fun.
